metadata.title: CVE-2023-34408 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
DokuWiki before 2023-04-04a allows XSS via RSS titles.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-34408` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dokuwiki - 0.0.20220731.a-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dokuwiki package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.0.20220731.a-2').
